question.title: How I can get the controllers battery level of Meta Quest in an android app
question.body:
I know that I can get the headset battery level by using the BatteryManager, what I want is to read the controllers battery level.

What I have tried:

Process process = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("dumpsys OVRRemoteService");

→ doesn't work (I don't have permission)

BatteryManager
→ Doesn't have the controllers battery level

Everything I have searched and tested has resulted in failure.

Does meta have a new API for that?

[Edit] I need that on Meta Quest 3

answers.body:
There's a Bluetooth SIG's standard Battery Service characteristic (UUID 0x2A19), which reports the percentage. It's availablity can be tested with other apps, for example: Nordic Semiconductor nRF Connect.

If available, take the base UUID 00000000-0000-1000-8000-00805F9B34FB combined with 0x2A19, which is the org.bluetooth.characteristic.battery_level. There's a lot of services, eg. 0000180F-0000-1000-8000-00805F9B34FB would be the Battery Service itself.

/* org.bluetooth.characteristic.battery_level */
UUID.fromString("00002A19-0000-1000-8000-00805F9B34FB");

This would be the relevant specs for the Battery Service and it's characteristics.
While I've even found a quite suitable tutorial, which explains the client-side ...

79844190.body: Thank you very much for your feedback, but I will probably conclude that removing the controller's battery is not possible at the moment. Hopefully, there will be an update on this in the future.

@vanle There you can see what is being exposed, all of them. When it's not being shown, it's not supported. While it's unlikely that it's not supported or that they'd use any other UUID for standard services & characteristics. The AirBuds have it, too.

I hope you haven't misunderstood my question; I need to retrieve the value on Meta Quest 3. However, I've tried your method, and when I use nRF Connect to connect to Quest 3, I can't find UUID 0x2A19. I've also tried code to find the service on Quest, but I get the same result.
